channel.title: I Need a Crew
channel.description:
[b]About Us[/b]
Yo, Im Xdarklight.X or in game name Mod Nick. Im the owner of Fallenscape and im looking for a crew. I dont need coders or hoster but what i need is a trust able Player Mod and Admin Crew. You WILL start of as a Player Mod and i will see how good you are and i might give you admin but yea were still kinda in beta.
[b]Requirements[/b]
-Must be experienced in Priavte server and not a retard in small things like "How do i spawn"
-know how to listen
-must be mature
[b]If your just a person that wants to spawn and not help then this isnt for you[/b]
[b]Admins Mods[/b]
Dark Claw Pwnd Ya Mod Zilla Raphie - - - - - - -
[b]Player Mods[/b]
- - - - - - -
Ill PM you my server IP on MSN os Moapr so yea
[b]Contact Me[/b] MSN (preffered) - xdarklight.x@hotmail.com Yahoo - NONE Aim -NOT GIVEN
[code] Name : Age : Position : Experience : why should i hire you : Msn : [/code]
Thanks for reading.

item.title: I Need a Crew
item.dc:creator: @KingKj52 KingKj52
item.description:
@KingKj52 wrote:

Name : KingKj52
Age : 13
Position : Admin (Mod if need be, up to you)
Experience : I’m a mod in 4 different servers, and an Admin in 2. I am in a BETA stage as well in my server with a few others *I’m Owner, duh :D) but I got tired of working on it because I wanted to put forth a helping effort in the community.
why should i hire you : I am trustworthy, helpful, and will do as told when needed. If someone needs help, I just can’t say no.
Msn : jordan-day@hotmail.com (already added you).

Read full topic
